meanings.definition: To incorrectly enroll or register someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The teacher accidentally misenrols a student in the wrong class.
meanings.sent2: Please double-check to ensure you do not misenrol any participants in the event.
meanings.sent3: In a mix-up, the system decided to misenrol the cat as a student in the school.
meanings.sent4: The misenroled names on the list stood out like sore thumbs.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of misenrolling can lead to confusion and delays.

meanings.definition: To mistakenly enter someone or something on a list or register.
meanings.sent1: She didn't mean to misenrol her friend's name on the attendance sheet.
meanings.sent2: The secretary must be careful not to misenrol any important information in the database.
meanings.sent3: The computer glitch caused it to misenrol the dog as a member of the book club.
meanings.sent4: The misenroled data skewed the overall statistics.
meanings.sent5: Remember to review your work to avoid misenrolling any critical details.
